titles.title: A bill to modify and extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain vacuum relief valves designed for use in aircraft.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the article description for pedestal assemblies for vacuum relief valves for aircraft to suspend temporarily the duty on vacuum relief valves for equalizing pressure between the internal aircraft cabin and external atmosphere.
